languages.text: {n}Идира нервным жестом теребит пальцы, а потом со вздохом опускает руки.{/n} "Право, Лорд-капитан. И без меня забот хватает, а?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира нервным жестом теребит пальцы, а потом со вздохом опускает руки.{/n} "Право, Лорд-капитан. И без меня забот хватает, а?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉紧张地扯着手指，之后叹了口气，松开了手。{/n}“好吧，舰长大人。还有，不用再担心我的事情了，好吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉紧张地扯着手指，之后叹了口气，松开了手。{/n}“好吧，舰长大人。还有，不用再担心我的事情了，好吗？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

languages.text: {n}Idira estira los dedos con nerviosismo antes de separar las manos con un suspiro.{/n} «Tiene razón, Lord Capitán. No tiene que preocuparse tanto por mí, ¿de acuerdo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira estira los dedos con nerviosismo antes de separar las manos con un suspiro.{/n} «Tiene razón, Lord Capitán. No tiene que preocuparse tanto por mí, ¿de acuerdo?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは緊張した仕草で指をとり、ため息をついて手を離した。{/n}「その通りよ、ロード・キャプテン。そして、あたいのことはもう心配しなくていいの。わかった？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは緊張した仕草で指をとり、ため息をついて手を離した。{/n}「その通りよ、ロード・キャプテン。そして、あたいのことはもう心配しなくていいの。わかった？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira zieht sich nervös an den Fingern, bevor sie ihre Hände mit einem Seufzer fallenlässt.{/n} "Ihr habt völlig recht, Lord Captain. Und jetzt genug mit den Sorgen um mich, ja?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira zieht sich nervös an den Fingern, bevor sie ihre Hände mit einem Seufzer fallenlässt.{/n} "Ihr habt völlig recht, Lord Captain. Und jetzt genug mit den Sorgen um mich, ja?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira tire nerveusement sur ses doigts, puis détend ses mains en poussant un soupir.{/n} « Vous avez bien raison, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et franchement, vous devriez arrêter de vous inquiéter pour moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira tire nerveusement sur ses doigts, puis détend ses mains en poussant un soupir.{/n} « Vous avez bien raison, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et franchement, vous devriez arrêter de vous inquiéter pour moi. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, parmaklarını gergince çekiştirdikten sonra iç çekerek ellerini gevşetiyor.{/n} "Aynen Lord Kaptan. Ben olmadan da endişelenecek bir sürü meselen var zaten."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tugs her fingers in a nervous gesture before releasing her hands with a sigh.{/n} "Right you are, Lord Captain. And enough worrying about me, all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, parmaklarını gergince çekiştirerek bir hareket yapıyor. Ardından iç çekerek ellerini gevşetiyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ da haklısın Lord Kaptan. Ayrıca benim için endişelendiğin yeter, anlaştık mı?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
